items.title: 苹果停止签署 iOS 18.5 (原标题: Apple Stops Signing iOS 18.5)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果停止签署 iOS 18.5

苹果已于2025年8月5日停止签署 iOS 18.5，这意味着已升级到 iOS 18.6 的 iPhone 用户将无法再降级到此前的版本。iOS 18.6 是在一周多前发布的。

## “签署”的含义

*   **定义**：“签署”是苹果在 iPhone 下载新版 iOS 时进行的一项服务器端验证检查。
*   **目的**：
    *   更新必须通过此验证检查才能下载和安装。
    *   取消签署过程可防止用户安装不安全的过时 iOS 版本。
    *   苹果通常在新版本发布约一周后停止签署旧版软件，以确保用户获得最新的安全改进，并免受已知攻击的威胁。

## iOS 18.6 的发布与重点

*   **发布时间**：iOS 18.6 于一周多前发布。
*   **主要侧重**：该版本主要侧重于安全更新。
*   **漏洞修复**：iOS 18.6 解决了超过20个安全漏洞。

![iOS 18](https://images.macrumors.com/t/3DG3keJZy2MQZccAZKIxBvB8iic=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/iOS-18.5-Apple-Intelligence-Color-Palette-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已停止签署 iOS 18.5，这意味着升级到 iOS 18.6 的 iPhone 用户无法降级。此举旨在确保用户运行最新、最安全的系统版本。iOS 18.6 于一周多前发布，主要侧重于安全更新，修复了20多个漏洞。苹果通常在新版本发布约一周后停止签署旧版本，以防止安装不安全的软件。
items.content:
Apple is no longer signing iOS 18.5, which means iPhone users who have upgraded to iOS 18.6 can no longer downgrade to the prior version of iOS. iOS 18.6 was released a little over a week ago.


"Signing" is a server-side verification check that Apple does when a new version of iOS is downloaded on an ‌iPhone‌. An update can't be downloaded and installed unless it passes the verification check, and the unsigning process prevents customers from installing outdated versions of iOS that are less secure.

Apple usually stops signing older software about a week after releasing an update, and doing so ensures that customers have the latest security improvements and are not vulnerable to known attacks.

iOS 18.6 was focused on security updates, and it addressed more than 20 vulnerabilities.
This article, "Apple Stops Signing iOS 18.5" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 5 中的所有新功能 (原标题: Everything New in iOS 26 Beta 5)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### iOS 26 Beta 5 更新亮点

苹果公司于2025年8月5日发布了iOS 26的第五个开发者测试版。尽管重大变化数量有所减少，但该版本引入了多项细微调整和改进，旨在为9月正式发布的iOS 26做准备，主要集中在按钮布局、动画和整体设计方面。

![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

以下是iOS 26 Beta 5中的主要新功能和调整：

*   **相机 (Camera)**
    *   新增“经典模式”切换开关，允许用户在不同模式间切换时反转滚动方向。
    *   ![ios 26 classic mode beta 5](https://images.macrumors.com/t/D3sc1Wm358cmeak1VcKHdysj_Fo=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-classic-mode-beta-5.jpg?lossy)
*   **邮件 (Mail)**
    *   邮件应用中现在有一个专用的“选择”按钮，不再隐藏在“...”菜单中。
    *   ![ios 26 mail app select](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Q0krU-XHwj8z_A8GWQ1aPSWU2zk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-mail-app-select.jpg?lossy)
*   **隔空投送图标 (AirDrop Icon)**
    *   共享表单中新增了隔空投送图标。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 airdrop icon](https://images.macrumors.com/t/rCsPs1TAbNcUxnoc6_IpWSwVgtM=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-airdrop-icon.jpg?lossy)
*   **锁定屏幕 (Lock Screen)**
    *   输入密码时，数字会跳入到位，呈现新的动画效果。
    *   在播放音乐时锁定iPhone，也会有新的动画。
*   **控制中心 (Control Center)**
    *   在控制中心页面滑动时，新增了弹跳动画效果。
    *   **Wi-Fi 按钮**：长按Wi-Fi图标时，现在会显示Wi-Fi网络是私人还是公共。如果网络受密码保护，Wi-Fi符号旁边会显示一个锁。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 wifi](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7vvcn3HUx8HaN_i2vsLTiFCNAyg=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-wifi.jpg?lossy)
*   **旅行功能 (Traveling Features)**
    *   Siri新增预测功能，可判断用户何时即将旅行，并在用户离开本国时提供蜂窝网络连接建议。
*   **钱包 (Wallet)**
    *   钱包应用中Apple Card的“支付”按钮现在被标记为“预授权支付”，以使其功能更清晰。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 wallet app](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ci95E9L1V-D3uLF3VHbOyCFaajw=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-wallet-app.jpg?lossy)
*   **启动画面 (Splash Screens)**
    *   更多应用拥有iOS 26的启动画面，向用户预览新功能。
    *   ![ios 26 splash screens](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_4HzF9_BMTRGTH_mIPyDz6IseuQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-splash-screens.jpg?lossy)
*   **电池 (Battery)**
    *   当iPhone电池电量达到20%时，灵动岛会显示低电量警告。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 battery icon](https://images.macrumors.com/t/lfAIfAHvK70fJSMEJYBJARwfVKI=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-battery-icon.jpg?lossy)
*   **Dock 栏 (Dock)**
    *   主屏幕Dock栏周围的“液体玻璃”效果变得更宽。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 dock](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4xJD1i7381Pt1DifOFQv6tyJRRo=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-dock.jpg?lossy)
*   **健身 (Fitness)**
    *   健身应用中Fitness+有了新图标。
    *   ![ios 26 beta 5 fitness app](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XUybaToB0iQYHspAGU9IZQtLZTk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-beta-5-fitness-app.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 5带来了多项细微改进，包括相机新增“经典模式”反转滚动方向，邮件应用有专用“选择”按钮。锁定屏幕和控制中心增加了新动画，控制中心Wi-Fi可显示网络类型。Siri新增旅行蜂窝连接预测，钱包中的Apple Card支付按钮更名。此外，还有更多应用启动画面、灵动岛低电量警告、更宽的Dock栏“液体玻璃”效果以及健身应用新图标等更新，旨在优化用户体验。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 Beta 5 中的所有新功能
items.content:
Apple seeded the fifth developer beta of iOS 26 today, and while the number of significant changes has dropped, there are quite a few smaller tweaks. Apple is continuing to refine button placement, animations, and design in preparation for launching ‌iOS 26‌ in September.


Camera


Apple added a toggle in the Camera app to allow users to toggle on Classic Mode, a setting that reverses the scroll direction when you swap from mode to mode.


Mail


There is now a dedicated Select button in the Mail app, instead of the button being tucked away inside of the "..." menu.


AirDrop Icon


There is a new AirDrop icon in the Share Sheet.


Lock Screen


There is an animation when entering your passcode on the Lock Screen, with the numbers jumping in to place. There's also a new animation when locking the iPhone when playing music.

iOS 26 beta 5 adds a new animation to the passcode screen pic.twitter.com/ZO54DZokA9

— Aaron (@aaronp613) August 5, 2025


Control Center


There's a new bouncy animation when swiping through Control Center pages.

iOS 26 beta 5 tweaks Control Center's animation pic.twitter.com/lf33mimNIW

— Aaron (@aaronp613) August 5, 2025

Control Center Wi-Fi


The Wi-Fi button in Control Center now shows whether a Wi-Fi network is private or public when long pressing on the Wi-Fi icon. If a Wi-Fi network is password protected, it has a lock next to the Wi-Fi symbol.


Traveling Features


Apple is adding a predictive Siri feature that can determine when you are about to travel, showing suggestions for cellular connectivity while you are out of your home country.

Wallet


In the Wallet app, the "Payments" button for Apple Card is now labeled "Preauthorized Payments" to make it more clear what the button is for.


Splash Screens


There are ‌iOS 26‌ Splash Screens for more apps, giving people a preview of what's new.


Battery


There is a Dynamic Island low battery warning when the battery hits 20 percent on an ‌iPhone‌.


Dock


The Liquid Glass surrounding the Home Screen dock is wider


Fitness


There is a new icon for Fitness+ in the Fitness app.



Read More


We have additional info on all of the new features in ‌iOS 26‌ in our roundup.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26

items.title: 苹果向开发者发布 macOS Sequoia 15.7 发布候选版本 (原标题: Apple Seeds macOS Sequoia 15.7 Release Candidate to Developers)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## macOS Sequoia 15.7 发布候选版本

苹果公司于2025年8月5日星期二意外地向开发者发布了macOS Sequoia 15.7的发布候选版本。此更新将紧随上周发布的macOS Sequoia 15.6更新。

### 获取方式

开发者可以通过“系统设置”应用中的“软件更新”部分选择加入macOS Sequoia测试版。

### 更新内容与重要性

根据苹果的发布说明，此更新包含重要的安全修复，并推荐所有用户安装。鉴于其迅速升级到发布候选状态，macOS Sequoia 15.7很可能解决了某个关键的安全漏洞。

### 预期发布

预计该版本将在未来几天内正式发布。

![macOS Sequoia Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JgHCE-ZFe2dtlbROOzncgRit_IQ=/400x0/article-new/2024/06/macOS-Sequoia-Feature.jpg?lossy)

items.title: Macintosh HD 在最新 macOS Tahoe Beta 中获得新外观 (原标题: Macintosh HD Gets a New Look in Latest macOS Tahoe Beta)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### macOS Tahoe Beta 5 更新 Macintosh HD 图标

在最新的 macOS Tahoe Beta 5 中，苹果对内置 Mac 存储（Macintosh HD）的桌面图标进行了设计更新，这引起了一些偏爱原始外观的长期 Mac 用户的不满。

*   **图标变化：**
    *   旧图标：仍然类似于传统的硬盘驱动器（HDD）。
    *   新图标：看起来像现代的固态硬盘（SSD）。

*   **更新原因：** 苹果的 Mac 电脑自十多年前起就已停止使用硬盘驱动器。最后一款包含硬盘组件的 Mac 是低成本的 21.5 英寸 iMac，它使用了苹果的 SSD + HDD 融合硬盘（Fusion Drive）。目前所有 Mac 都使用固态硬盘（SSD）。

*   **用户选项：** 如果用户不喜欢新图标，可以选择完全隐藏 Macintosh HD。操作方法是：打开 Finder 应用的设置，取消勾选“硬盘”旁边的复选框。

*   **其他图标更新：** 在之前的 Beta 版本中，苹果还更新了“磁盘工具”（Disk Utility）和“访达”（Finder）的图标。其中，Finder 图标的颜色方案最初被反转（左浅右深），但由于用户强烈反对，苹果最终将其恢复为经典的颜色排列。

![macOS Tahoe Beta 5 Macintosh HD](https://images.macrumors.com/t/v8pY8yXci_sYY0RKSTypj9GPRos=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/macOS-Tahoe-Beta-5-Macintosh-HD.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: macOS Tahoe Beta 5 更新了 Macintosh HD 的桌面图标，将其从传统的硬盘驱动器外观改为现代固态硬盘样式。此更改反映了苹果Mac电脑十多年来已全面采用SSD的事实。用户可以通过Finder设置选择隐藏该图标。此前，苹果也更新了磁盘工具和访达图标，其中访达图标因用户反对而恢复了经典配色。
items.translated_title: Macintosh HD 在最新 macOS Tahoe Beta 中获得新外观
items.content:
Apple has been updating some classic Mac icons during the macOS Tahoe beta, upsetting some longtime Mac users who prefer the original look. In beta 5, Apple changed the design of the built-in Mac storage icon, which you'll notice if you have it on your desktop.


The existing icon still resembled a hard disk drive, but the new icon looks like a modern solid state drive. Apple's Macs stopped using hard disk drives starting more than a decade ago. The low-cost 21.5-inch iMac was the last Mac that had a hard drive component, as it used Apple's SSD + HDD Fusion Drive. All current Macs use SSDs.

If you don't want to see the new icon, you can hide Macintosh HD from view entirely. To do so, open up the Finder app's settings and click the check mark next to "Hard disks."

Apple also updated Disk Utility and the Finder icon in earlier betas. With the Finder icon, Apple initially reversed the color scheme with the light shade on the left and the dark on the right, but the uproar was so significant that Apple had to return it to the classic color arrangement.
This article, "Macintosh HD Gets a New Look in Latest macOS Tahoe Beta" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 苹果发布MagSafe充电器固件更新 (原标题: Apple Releases Updated MagSafe Charger Firmware)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果发布MagSafe充电器固件更新

苹果于2025年8月5日发布了25W MagSafe充电器的固件更新。此次更新提升了充电器的性能和兼容性。

## 固件版本与兼容性

*   **新固件版本：** 内部版本号为2A168，在“设置”应用中显示为148。
*   **旧固件版本：** 此前版本为2A146（内部），在“设置”中显示为136。
*   **兼容设备：** 该固件更新适用于兼容iPhone 12及后续机型，以及最新款AirPods的MagSafe充电器。

## 充电器型号与功率

*   **充电器型号：** 此固件更新针对的是2024年随iPhone 16机型一同发布的MagSafe充电器。
*   **充电功率：**
    *   对于iPhone 16机型，该充电器可提供高达25W的充电功率。
    *   对于iPhone 12至iPhone 15机型，充电功率上限为15W。
*   **市场供应：** 苹果已用这款新模型替换了所有旧款MagSafe充电器，目前仅销售2024年版本。

## 固件更新方式

*   **更新机制：** 固件更新通过无线（OTA）方式静默发布，苹果并未提供具体的发布说明，因此新功能或错误修复的详细信息尚不明确。
*   **触发更新：** 没有明确的手动更新方法，但充电器需要插入电源并连接到一台苹果设备才能触发固件更新。
*   **查看版本：** 用户可以参考相关指南来检查其MagSafe充电器的当前固件版本。

![新MagSafe充电器](https://images.macrumors.com/t/pK_aixFrwNBBqAdNqekjwoje7rE=/400x0/article-new/2024/09/new-magsafe-charger.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了25W MagSafe充电器的新固件（版本2A168/148），兼容iPhone 12及后续机型和最新AirPods。该固件适用于2024年款MagSafe充电器，为iPhone 16提供25W充电，旧款iPhone则为15W。更新通过OTA静默进行，具体改进未知，需连接苹果设备触发。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布MagSafe充电器固件更新
items.content:
Apple today released a firmware update for the 25W MagSafe Charger that is compatible with the iPhone 12 and later and the latest AirPods. The new firmware is version 2A168, up from the 2A146 firmware that came out last year. In the Settings app, the new firmware is version 148, up from 136.


Apple introduced the 2024 ‌MagSafe‌ charger alongside the iPhone 16 models back in September, and it is able to charge them at up to 25W. For the ‌iPhone‌ 12 models to the iPhone 15 models, charging is capped at 15W. Apple replaced all of its ‌MagSafe‌ chargers with the new model, and now only sells the 2024 version.

Firmware updates are released quietly over the air, and Apple does not provide release notes. We don't know what new features or bug fixes might be included in the software.

There is no clear method for updating a ‌‌MagSafe‌‌ charger's firmware, but it needs to be plugged in and connected to an Apple device for a firmware update to initiate. You can check your ‌‌MagSafe‌‌ Charger's firmware by following the instructions in our MagSafe Charger how to.
Tag: MagSafe

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 揭示 Apple Watch Ultra 3 显示屏尺寸 (原标题: iOS 26 Beta Reveals Apple Watch Ultra 3 Display Size)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26 Beta 揭示 Apple Watch Ultra 3 显示屏尺寸

最新发布的 iOS 26 Beta 版本中包含的图像，证实了苹果正在开发新一代 Apple Watch Ultra，预计将于今年秋季发布。

### 主要发现

*   MacRumors 撰稿人 Aaron Perris 在 iOS 26 Beta 中发现了一张 Apple Watch 图像，其分辨率与当前任何 Apple Watch 型号都不符。
*   ![ultra 2 prime day](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GVdSnN2IpDFvPQXIwXc4YMisTo0=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ultra-2-prime-day.jpeg?lossy)

### 显示屏尺寸推测

*   该图像表明，即将推出的 Apple Watch Ultra 3 可能拥有略大的显示屏尺寸，分辨率为 422 x 514。
*   作为对比，当前的 Apple Watch Ultra 2 的分辨率为 410 x 502。

### 机身尺寸与边框

*   目前尚未有关于机身尺寸增加的传闻。
*   Apple Watch Ultra 3 有望在保持与当前版本相同尺寸的同时，通过缩小边框来实现更大的显示区域。

### 发布预期

*   苹果预计将在一个多月后发布 Apple Watch Ultra 3。
*   届时，新款 iPhone 17 和 Apple Watch Series 11 型号也可能一同亮相。

### 其他传闻功能

除了显示屏尺寸的提升，传闻还指出 Apple Watch Ultra 3 将具备以下功能：

*   卫星连接功能，用于离网通信。
*   更亮的显示屏和更快的刷新率。
*   搭载新的芯片。
*   以及即将推出的健康监测功能，例如血压监测。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 中的图像揭示了即将发布的 Apple Watch Ultra 3 可能拥有更大的显示屏。新发现的图像分辨率为 422 x 514，高于当前 Ultra 2 的 410 x 502。这表明 Ultra 3 可能在保持现有尺寸的同时，通过缩小边框来实现更大的显示区域。该设备预计将于今年秋季与 iPhone 17 一同发布，并可能支持卫星通信、更亮的显示屏、更快的刷新率和新的健康监测功能。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 Beta 揭示 Apple Watch Ultra 3 显示屏尺寸
items.content:
The latest iOS 26 beta includes imagery that confirms Apple's work on a new version of the Apple Watch Ultra, which is set to come out this fall. MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris found an Apple Watch image with a resolution that does not correspond to any current Apple Watch models.


The image suggests that the upcoming Apple Watch Ultra 3 could have a slightly larger display size, with a display resolution of 422 x 514. The current Apple Watch Ultra 2 has a 410 x 502 resolution.

We haven't heard rumors of an increase in casing size, but the Apple Watch Ultra 3 could be the same size as the current version with slimmed down bezels that allow for a larger display area.

Apple is expected to unveil the Apple Watch Ultra 3 in just over a month, alongside new iPhone 17 models and the Series 11 Apple Watch models.

Rumors suggest that the Ultra 3 will also feature satellite connectivity for off grid communication, a brighter display with a faster refresh rate, a new chip, and any health features that are coming such as blood pressure monitoring.
